body_html:
Actually, let me be more specific: as @cbecker pointed out, I don't want you to underestimate the work involved in getting Caffe2 to be export clean. There is a lot of code to fix. If we can figure out how to set things up so that we can incrementally fix the situation (and farm things out to Caffe2 devs), that would be much, much more sustainable.

CC @Yangqing

body:
Actually, let me be more specific: as @cbecker pointed out, I don't want you to underestimate the work involved in getting Caffe2 to be export clean. There is a lot of code to fix. If we can figure out how to set things up so that we can incrementally fix the situation (and farm things out to Caffe2 devs), that would be much, much more sustainable.

CC @Yangqing
